snippet.title: Quintus and the Formidable Curse | Release Trailer | June 28th 2024
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam at: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2440100/Quintus_and_the_Formidable_Curse/

Release Trailer for the upcoming video game 'Quintus and the Formidable Curse', a Horror-Adventure game following a Man and Mouse duo! This trailer gives viewers a peak into all that the game has to offer.

The game follows ‘Quintus and the Absent Truth’, which was released on PC and all last and current gen consoles in 2022, our unlikely team are ready to take on a new adventure, which promises to be larger and far more dangerous than this couplings first outing.

The plot picks up right after the events of the original game, throwing Alan and Quintus into an adventure that only a Man/Mouse duo could overcome.

Official Website: https://www.wrecktangles.com/qatfc
